fields.name: Whistle Trap:
fields.value: Whistle at someone's house. All visitors will receive the message "You hear whistling..."; one random player will investigate and receive the text "...and decide to investigate". Attack them with 1.5x Attack Power, and their visit will go to you instead. If your player has no visitors, attack them out of spite.

fields.name: Whistle Brainwash (1x, 200% CHARGE):
fields.value: Whistle at someone's house. Due to your endearing musical ability, attract all visitors AND your target to your house, then deal a 1.2x Attack Power rampage at your house.

fields.name: Tongue-Tied (Passive):
fields.value: If you ever place in the bottom 20% of contestants, lose -0.1x Attack and Defense Power.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the end of the game.
